store.title: UCBMUN T-Shirt
store.message: Remember your time at UCBMUN with a limited edition shirt commemorating our 22nd Conference.

store.title: UCBMUN Beer Mug
store.message: Drink to substansive debate and joyous cameraderie with the first ever UCBMUN beer mug!

store.title: UCBMUN Shot Glass
store.message: Take a shot at your rival in committee, but then take a shot with them afterwards.

store.title: UCBMUN Folder
store.message: Hold all of your committee papers and directives together in style.

store.title: UCBMUN Candy Gram
store.message: Send something sweet to that good looking delegate from New Zealand or your partner in crime in the Porfiriato.
